contents: If a power outage occurs in freezing or near freezing conditions, additional steps need to be taken to minimize damage. The maintenance staff will turn off and drain the fire sprinkler system and water lines. When power is restored, the maintenance staff will (4) <u>restore water flow. Then</u> check pipes for leaks from possible freeze damage. In very low temperatures, wait for electronic equipment to (5) <u>return from being cold or near frozen to room temperature</u> before restarting the equipment.
